original_text: The bronze from the things that King Solomon had made for the Lord's temple was very heavy. They included the two bronze pillars, the large bath called ‘the Sea’ and the carts which carried the buckets for water. The bronze from all these things was more than they could weigh.
korean_text: 또 솔로몬이 여호와의 성전을 위하여 만든 두 기둥과 한 바다와 받침들을 가져갔는데 이 모든 기구의 놋 무게를 헤아릴 수 없었으니

sentences.original_text: The bronze from the things that King Solomon had made
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬 왕이 만든 것들에서 나온 청동은

sentences.original_text: They included the two bronze pillars
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 두 개의 청동 기둥을 포함했습니다

sentences.original_text: and the carts which carried the buckets for water
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 물 담는 통을 운반하는 수레들이었습니다

sentences.original_text: The bronze from all these things
was more than they could weigh
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 무게를 잴 수 있는 것보다 더 많았습니다
